name: Croc's World 3
overview: 'Croc´s World 3' is a really nice jump'n'run with 60 incredible levels and many challenging enemies! It features: + 60 incredible levels + Nice graphics + 2 different themes + many challenging enemies + 4 evil endbosses Instructions: Jump and run through the levels and dodge all enemies. Collect a helmet to crush stoneblocks. Collect the stonebag to throw stones. Collect the special stonebag to throw auto-homing stones! Collect special items like 'Firehelmet' (walk through fire) or 'Shield' (Invincible for 10 seconds)! If you collect 100 diamonds you´ll get an extra life!
